net.proteusframework.core.mail

Interface MailPart

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMailPart, ByteSourceMailPart, FileMailPart, MemoryMailPart, MessageTemplateParser.MutableMailPart

    public interface MailPart
    Defines the data that encapsulates a part of an email message such as a body part or an attachment part.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Cleans up any resources used by the mail part.
      MailPart createCopy()
      Clone the mail part.
      java.lang.String getContentDisposition()
      Gets the content disposition attribute.
      java.lang.String getContentID()
      Get the Content-ID.
      java.lang.String getContentLocation()
      Get the Content-Location.
      java.lang.String getContentType()
      Gets the content type attribute.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets the description attribute.
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
      Gets the content as an InputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Cleans up any resources used by the mail part.

      • createCopy

        MailPart createCopy()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Clone the mail part.
        Returns:
        the copy.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error.

      • getContentDisposition

        java.lang.String getContentDisposition()
        Gets the content disposition attribute.
        Returns:
        The content disposition. May be null.

      • getContentID

        Get the Content-ID.
        Returns:
        the content ID. May be null.

        Returns:
        the content location. May be null.

      • getContentType

        java.lang.String getContentType()
        Gets the content type attribute.
        Returns:
        The contentType value.

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the description attribute.
        Returns:
        The description. May be null.

      • getInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the content as an InputStream.
        Returns:
        The inputStream value. The stream should be valid as long as the MailPart has not been closeed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs creating the input stream.
